review: I wish I would have known about this sooner. I was using a Smart DVD player, but it does not even compare to this. The fire stick is easy to use. My 5 year old maneuvers through it with ease. review: I had put in a return request on the Fire TV Stick, with a scathing complaint about its inability to hold a wifi connection that it rated Very Good one second, nonexistent the next. I worked my Internet provider over pretty hard (and there were issues there as well), but still no joy with the Fire Stick. Finally, in sheer exasperation with the whole situation, I took the advice of one of the Verizon techs - try a wifi range extender! So I spent another $35, and guess what - now the Fire Stick works like a champ. I'm not giving 5 stars, because I feel Amazon has been less than forthcoming in not warning that it's likely some users will need to double their investment before getting satisfactory performance. That said, I also found the search function somewhat lacking. I went looking for Sling Player for Fire TV, and got no results on the search. Really, Amazon? It was only upon lengthy clicking through the Apps menu that I finally found it. Once found, it works great. So I cancelled my return request and post this caveat for future buyers.
